name: Nightmares (dutchwarrior)
description:
NIGHTMARES

Its happening again. You are stuck in another nightmare. Your toys have come to life as zombies.

Kill as many zombie toys as you can and try to survive all 100 waves.

Controlls:

  • w,s,a,d (movement)
  • mouse (view)
  • mouse Button 1 (shoot)

This is a WIP Project!

how to install:

1. download the game (.zip file)
2. select file and extract them
3. open the "nightmares.exe" file
4. enjoy
